column1: 1919-08-09#Unidentified man#Massachusetts (Greenfield)#A suspected burglar was killed by a patrolman after the burglar pretended to surrender and allegedly struck the officer.
1919-06-30#David Kelly#Massachusetts (Boston)#Kelly was among several men who allegedly assaulted an officer
column2: causing severe injuries. The officer shot Kelly

column1: 1913-11-29#Unnamed man#New York (New York City)#A policeman killed a gunman after a foot chase.
1912-12-31#Unnamed man#Kentucky (Kuttawa)#A man went on a shooting spree in the towns of Fredonia and Kuttawa before he was killed by marshal William McCullom while resisting arrest.
